title.rendered: RAFFLES SECURES #2 POSITION AS BEST HOTEL BRAND IN THE WORLD IN THE TRAVEL + LEISURE 2023 WORLD’S BEST AWARDS

content.rendered:
NEW YORK CITY, July 12, 2023 /PRNewswire/ – Raffles Hotels & Resorts is excited to announce it has been awarded the coveted #2 position in the Best Hotel Brand category in the 2023 World’s Best Awards by Travel + Leisure, upholding the legendary brand’s status as a foremost leader in luxury hospitality. With an outstanding score of 98.59, the announcement marks the highest ranking awarded to the brand by Travel + Leisure, and is a testament to Raffles’ sustained vision, service and standards. The World’s Best Awards is an annual survey by Travel + Leisure readers of their favourite travel experiences around the world – from top hotels, resorts, cities, islands, cruise ships, spas, airlines, and more.


Continue Reading

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/raffles-secures-2-position-as-best-hotel-brand-in-the-world-in-the-travel–leisure-2023-worlds-best-awards-301875249.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
